rules_text:
When Enthusiatic Lab Partner enters, look at the top five cards of your library. You may exile a noncreature, nonland card from among them. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You may play the exiled card for as long as it remains exiled.
Conceptualize {2}{U} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its conceptualize cost. If you do, exile it when it enters the battlefield.)[/i]
